Slides

For courses

You can find here slides for courses that covers the topic of the book:

  • Optimal Transport for Imaging and Learning: introduction to OT and its application.
  • Numerical Optimal Transport and Applications: similar but with more mathematics.
  • From Monge-Kantorovich to Gromov-Wasserstein: introcution to Gromov-Wasserstein.
  • Le transport optimal et ses applications: introduction slides, in French.
